name: pusillanimity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality of being weak and cowardly (= not brave), or being frightened of taking risks: The school inspectors present an example of pusillanimity in action. She condemned passivity and pusillanimity. See
pusillanimous
More examplesFewer examplesTo go ahead with the partnership talks would send a message of astounding pusillanimity.The government's chronic pusillanimity is finally coming home to most people.They’ve been plunged into deeper trouble due largely to their own pusillanimity.
